summary: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.
cast: Roman Polanski|Isabelle Adjani|Melvyn Douglas|Jo Van Fleet|Bernard Fresson|Lila Kedrova|Claude Dauphin|Claude Piéplu|Rufus|Romain Bouteille|Jacques Monod|Patrice Alexsandre|Jean-Pierre Bagot|Josiane Balasko|Michel Blanc|Florence Blot|Louba Guertchikoff|Jacques Chevalier|Jacky Cohen|David Gabison|Bernard-Pierre Donnadieu|Alain Frérot|Raoul Guylad|Eva Ionesco|Gérard Jugnot|Héléna Manson|Maïté Nahyr|André Penvern|Gérard Pereira|Dominique Poulange|Arlette Reinerg|Jacques Rosny|Serge Spira|Vanessa Vaylord|François Viaur|Shelley Winters|Albert Delpy|Bruce Lee|Alain Sarde|Philippe Sarde
keywords: paranoia|landlord tenant relationship|conflict with neighbor|psychological disintegration|paris france
title: El quimérico inquilino
